#summary Fast Scientific Code in GroovyLab with Groovy++

= Introduction =

`GroovyLab supports Groovy++. With Groovy++, computationally demanding parts can be executed with speed similar to Java/Scala. We provide some benchmarks.

= Benchmarks =

{{{

class Loops {
    static double compute () {
        double sm = 0.0;
        int i=0; int j=0;
        while (i< 1000) {
          j=0
          while (j<2000) {
           sm = 0.000000033434*i*j
           j++
         }
        i++
       }
      return sm;     
    }

    
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        def start = System.currentTimeMillis()
        compute()
        println("Groovy: ${System.currentTimeMillis() - start}ms")
    }
}

 // Groovy time = 2548ms
}}}
